org.haldean.chopper.nav
Interface NavTask

All Known Implementing Classes:
NavDest, NavList, NavVel
public interface NavTask

Contains instructions for calculating a target velocity vector.

Author:
Benjamin Bardin

Field Summary
static int NAVPAUSE
          Arbitrary value used by some NavTasks in deciding when next to evaluate the next navigation vector.
 
Method Summary
 long getInterval()
          Calculates how long to wait before recalculating the target velocity vector.
 void getVelocity(double[] target)
          Calculates a new target velocity vector.
 boolean isComplete()
          Calculates whether or not the NavTask has been functionally achieved.
 String toString()
          Serializes a NavTask to String form.
 

Field Detail

NAVPAUSE

static final int NAVPAUSE
Arbitrary value used by some NavTasks in deciding when next to evaluate the next navigation vector. Smaller values mean more accurate navigation vectors at the expense of CPU time.

See Also:
Constant Field Values
Method Detail

getInterval

long getInterval()
Calculates how long to wait before recalculating the target velocity vector.

Returns:
The time in ms.

isComplete

boolean isComplete()
Calculates whether or not the NavTask has been functionally achieved.

Returns:
true if the NavTask has been completed, false otherwise.

getVelocity

void getVelocity(double[] target)
Calculates a new target velocity vector.

Parameters:
target - The array in which to store the vector. Must be at least length 4.

toString

String toString()
Serializes a NavTask to String form.

Overrides:
toString in class Object
Returns:
The String serialization of the NavTask.
